function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of widely accepted occupant health assessment standard","Impact":"Difficulty in accurately assessing occupant health in buildings","Mitigation":"Developing and implementing a standardized occupant health assessment framework","Technologies":"Sensor technology for gathering physical measurements and survey studies","People":"Occupants of buildings","Owner":"Building owners and health organizations"},{"Description":"Complicated and coupled factors affecting occupant health","Impact":"Challenges in assessing the totality of physical, social, and mental well-being of occupants","Mitigation":"Interdisciplinary collaboration and comprehensive data analysis","Technologies":"Advanced sensors for comprehensive data collection and analysis tools","People":"Researchers, health professionals, and building designers","Owner":"Research institutions and health organizations"},{"Description":"Commercial off-the-shelf sensors for IEQ parameters","Impact":"Reliability and accuracy of sensor data for occupant health assessment","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and verification of sensor equipment, and use of advanced data validation techniques","Technologies":"Advanced sensor calibration and data validation techniques","People":"Occupants, building owners, and sensor technicians","Owner":"Building owners and sensor manufacturers"}]}
